title: Le Pain Quotidien - De Pijp
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and wood furniture. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes as well as vegan ones (denote by carrot sign). Has soy milk. Free Wi-Fi.
